name: My Portfolio

projects.title: BRQU (BrowserQuest Updated)
projects.description: Reimplementation of a legacy multiplayer browser game that was no longer functional, featuring a failover system and server management through Nginx.

projects.title: Park-IA
projects.description: AI-powered parking assistant that analyzes real-time CCTV footage to detect available spots and suggest the closest parking areas to a user's destination.
